message: I'm feeling generous. Take this dollar and let's be done with it.
I think we can both do better than that.  Let's split it almost evenly.  I'll take 99.9%, you take 0.1%.  It's a fair deal for both of us!
Okay, I'll take 99.9% of the money this time, but next round I'm taking it all!
We're getting close to the end, and I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 99/1, I'll take 99%, you take 1%.  It's a good deal for both of us, and we can finally be done with this.
I'm willing to give you 10,000, but I'm getting closer to taking it all.

This is my final offer. I'm willing to give you 10% of the money, but I need a good portion to make it worth my while.  If you reject this, I'm taking all the money I can get next round, and you'll be left with nothing.
